name: Transported Into A Fantasy Realm?? I Got Isekai'd Into Another World With Only My Smart Fridge!
name_original: Transported Into A Fantasy Realm?? I Got Isekai'd Into Another World With Only My Smart Fridge!
description:
Transported Into A Fantasy Realm?? I Got Isekai'd Into Another World With Only My Smart Fridge!

after Protagonist-san gets into a terrible accident, they find themselves suddenly isekai'd into some random fantasy world! not only that, but it looks like... wait, that's Protagonist-san's... smart-fridge???

that's right! they are now stranded with only their smart-fridge to their protagonist name! help them save the world by completing quests, and maybe Protagonist-san and their smart-fridge can return to their world!

CONTROLS:

[R] key to reset

[ESCAPE] key to quit

[SPACEBAR] to continue dialogue

[1], [2], [3] keys to choose dialogue

[F], [M], [T], [S], [A], [N], [O], [B] keys to interact

[P] to open and close menu

[[ psst! some characters have more dialogue after completing their quests :) ]]

tldr; a self-indulgence story for my brain characters to exist in an isekai world
